description: I starts fine with no issues, but a few minutes it just crash with out any warning! it a shame because I like the way it looks similar to gnome-mpv. any updates in near future? thanks
crashes as soon as it opens to library screen.

This app was made exclusively for Elementary OS, with their strange Mac/GNOME mashup graphical toolkit. 

I don't blame them for not considering other desktops but it does not integrate with GTK-based desktops and it crashes every time you manually scan your library. Unusable.

I wish GNOME had a simple, beautiful GTK-based local film collection program. All the other ones either make your eyes bleed or haven't been updated in years. If I had the time to learn programming I would...

This plays my videos very well, and I love it's ui.
The way it segments and organizes my files definitely brings nice quality of life feel.
Only issue is that it doesn't have too many options when it come to player interface like volume settings and a full screen button. Unless I'm missing something?
no se instala es demasiado mala prefiero el roblox que esta app mala
summary: una aplicacion muy mala [no la recomiendo]

description: Funciona muy bien y su opción de poner carátulas a las películas es muy buena.

Pas mal, mais c'est dommage de ne pas avoir le choix du lecteur, comme VLC par exemple... plutôt que celui qui se trouve en interne.
Je préfère chercher un autre similaire, mais avec possibilité d'avoir le choix du player.
